description: The image captures a man wearing a flat cap and a blue jacket, with a playful expression, as a colorful parrot perches on his head. In the background, a wooden structure and another parrot on a branch can be seen, along with a blurred figure of a woman wearing a raincoat. The setting appears to be an aviary or a similar environment where birds are kept.
poem:
There once was a man with a hat,
Who found where the parrots were at.
One perched on his crown,
With feathers so brown,
In a moment both quirky and pat.
